column2: an A.M. Eatery////First time to visit.  In my neighborhood and a 5 start Yelp review.  Yes
column4: I trusted your reviews and you did not lead me astray.  We went on Presidents Day...and it was packed.  It was a 20 minute wait...but worth it.  Coffee was available outside under the umbrellas. Service was swift and pleasant.  Even though the kitchen was slammed
column5: the food arrived perfectly and was delicious!  We will be back.  The perfect food and vib for The Heights!
